free_text.Learning outcomes: The main pedagogical goals of this course are:[br/][li] To define the basic elements of a complete and effective presentation.[br/][li] To practice creating and delivering each element of an effective presentation.[br/][li] To gain self-awareness of one's strengths and weaknesses as a presenter and to learn to  play to the strengths and compensate for the weaknesses.[br/][li] To learn how to use your voice to its best effect (training with a voice coach)[br/][li] To explore the differences in communication style between various cultural groups and to learn how to effectively present to diverse audiences.[br/][li] To learn how to create effective visual aids which support your verbal message.[br/][li] To experience making an effective presentation as part of a group. [br/][li] To gain confidence and overcome nervousness in front of an audience.
